Azerbaijan is known as a very reliable partner in the international arena. Our foreign policy is open (cont) http://t.co/3cXmBso12f
Azerbaijan demonstrates a principled position on each issue. This position is primarily the international (cont) http://t.co/CQUMdgLQ8B
Turkish Prime Minister visited Azerbaijan After the municipal elections, this is the first (cont) http://t.co/ArlqvSyuMt
My official visit to the Islamic Republic of Iran was very successful. The documents signed during this visit are (cont) http://t.co/f5WzMGb5EQ
We are actively cooperating with both international organizations and at the same time, our relations with neighboring countries are traditional (cont) http://t.co/QOqzWdtEtj
History connects us with neighbors, past. Today, as our independent states, our bilateral relations (cont) http://t.co/Ee5xebsiy0
There has been no progress in resolving the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict. Although (cont) http://t.co/JVU69V3Rn2
Armenia wants neither the military nor the peace, and international mediators, unfortunately, do not make serious pressure on them.
International sanctions have long been applied against Armenia. Because Armenia has been for more than twenty years (cont) http://t.co/u7AHl319Ry
Four UN Security Council resolutions, international norms are violated. Other international organizations - (cont) http://t.co/3iQthmnmHH
How long will we face these double standards? What is the reason for this? Why so-called "Nagorno-Karabakh (cont) http://t.co/BpBrlY8edn
We raise our voice of protest against double standards in international relations. The collaborator (cont) http://t.co/BRpLwV1nVO
They go and spend illegal telemarafons, collect money. Then use those money against us (cont) http://t.co/LoDtXmoH0
The time has come for us to make our minds clearer. We have this binary (cont) http://t.co/ELCgHmLNGN
Why is the aggressor so far not turned into a condemnation? Why the Council of Europe Parliament (cont) http://t.co/rjtQrmuP0X
They say, let's go, go and talk, and solve it peacefully. Ethnic cleansing against us (cont) http://t.co/7aGLRL7bzR
Devious policy against us, double standard policy continues. But we will never agree with it.

PM Netanyahu shares in the sorrow of the family of the police officer murdered yesterday en route to a seder meal to celebrate Passover.
PM: This reprehensible murder of a man traveling with his family to a meal for the Festival of Freedom is the result of the PA's incitement
PM: The PA continues to constantly broadcast - in its official media - programs that incite against the existence of the State of Israel.
PM: Last night this incitement was translated into the murder of a father traveling w / his family to celebrate the first night of Passover.
PM: The incitement of the Palestinian Authority continues in that it has yet to see fit to condemn this abominable and reprehensible act.
